title: The Animals of Canada
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 61 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 110L
description: Students will get to know some of Canada's rich wildlife in this early leveled reader. Simple, patterned text with one-to-one picture correspondence introduces students to moose, bear, eagles, and other majestic animals.
meta: bear, eagle, goose, lives, loon, moose
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Short Vowels : Listen for medial short /i/ sound
Short Vowels : Identify and read words with Ii
Animal Names : Sort and classify animal names

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
